definition: to flow backwards (of water, because of flood, tide, wind etc)/reverse flow/to back up (sewage)
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit

sentences.english: There's a funny smell of soot blowing down the chimney.
sentences.chinese: 烟囱里倒灌进一股刺鼻的煤烟。

sentences.english: The saltwater intrusion frequently has bad effect on the development of the cities near the estuary.
sentences.chinese: 盐水入侵，盐水倒灌时常危害长江口附近城市的发展。

sentences.english: Flap valve is mainly installed in the end of drainage pipeline to prevent extra water flow backward.
sentences.chinese: 拍门主要安装在排水管道的尾端，用于防止外水倒灌。

sentences.english: As a dirt siltation of rivers in flood season will cause rainwater intrusion phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 由于河道有污物淤积，在汛期还会造成雨水倒灌现象。

sentences.english: They'll be raised from the sea bed to shut Off high tides.
sentences.chinese: 涨潮的时候，从海底升起阻止潮水倒灌。

sentences.english: The tides at highest mark regorge the flood.
sentences.chinese: 涨到最高点的潮水使洪水倒灌。

definition: to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
(of a watercourse) to breach its dike/(of dikes) to collapse
